description:
W-What is WRONG with the Gachi Rangers today…? The characters, the scenario, the acting, it`s all off! This is wrong…The Gachi Rangers aren`t usually this stupid! What is this…what`s going on?  Every single character is a moron! Who…Who ruined my Gachi Rangers?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Targeted Children! Countdown to Japan`s Doom!
狙われた子供たち! 日本滅亡カウントダウン!
